fr.qxmlmoodle.question
Class AbstractQuestion

java.lang.Object
  fr.qxmlmoodle.question.AbstractQuestion
All Implemented Interfaces:
IXMLExport, IXMLImport
Direct Known Subclasses:
QuestionCalculated, QuestionCloze, QuestionDescription, QuestionEssay, QuestionMatching, QuestionMultiChoice, QuestionNumerical, QuestionShortAnswer, QuestionTrueFalse
public abstract class AbstractQuestion
extends java.lang.Object
implements IXMLImport, IXMLExport

Class Question base for all question type.

Constructor Detail

AbstractQuestion

public AbstractQuestion(QuestionType questionType)
Construct and set the question Type. You set the question type only in the constructor and it can be modified after (no default constructor)

Parameters:
questionType - type of the question

addAnswer

public final AbstractAnswer addAnswer()
Add an answer.

Returns:
the answer added

createAnswer

public abstract AbstractAnswer createAnswer()
Create the specific answer depend of question type. Question can have different kind of answer, so each question needs to code this method

Returns:
the answer depend of question
